Yep, just for a heads up anyway.  It would be amusing if somehow friendship=
s did evolve between factions as they did in Beast Wars.  Talon was a Pred =
before she met Tucson and he readily accepted her anyway.  He believes that=
 it's a wonderful thing to be able to see past the faction badge and see th=
e individual for who they are personally.  That's what's happening with Str=
aight Shot..  Lol.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
